description: This file is a Python source code file that sets up a knowledge base using a PDF document and a MongoDB vector database, then creates an agent to answer questions based on this knowledge.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, integrating with a vector database.

classes.name: MongoDb
classes.description: A class representing a MongoDB vector database integration.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer questions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
